Job ID: 96
Raw description:  Software Engineer(s)/ Developer(s) with atleast 5 years of Experience in Core Java/J2EE added with SOAP/API/REST services development. Exposure to Cloud (AWS ) and any Open Source UI technologies is desirable. Exposure to Engineering practice including Pipleine build is desired. Should be able to work independently in Small team with minimal support. Very Good communication and exposure to Agile Process. Understand and can perform the entire Lifecycle of Software including Development/ Testing and Support. Core Java/J2EE (Multithreading, OOPS,) API/SOAP/REST (JSON, JAX R) Jenkins, CICD, GIT  * API/SOAP/REST (JSON, JAX R): 3 years Jenkins, CICD, GIT: 3 years Core Java/J2EE: 5 years Toronto, ON Role : Backend Java Developer Duration : 12+ months Location : Toronto ,ON Job Description:  MANDATORY SKILLS â€“ Job Type: Contract Experience: Location: Apply Now
